Sentencas: Ni-ceria cermets are potential anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, thanks to the catalytic activity and mixed conductivities of ceria-based materials associated with the variable valence states of cerium.
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment

Sentencas: However, the anodic reaction mechanism in the Ni-ceria systems needs to be further revealed.
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment

Sentencas: Via density functional theory with strong correlated correction method, this work gains insight into reaction pathways of hydrogen oxidation on a model system of Ni-10-CeO2(111).
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment

Sentencas: The calculation shows that electrons tend to be transferred from Ni-10 cluster to cerium surface, creating surface oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment

Sentencas: Six pathways are proposed considering different adsorption sites, and the interface pathway proceeding with hydrogen spillover is found to be the prevailing process, which includes a high adsorption energy of -1.859 eV and an energy barrier of 0.885 eV.
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment

Sentencas: The density functional theory (DFT) calculation results are verified through experimental measurements including electrical conductivity relaxation and temperature programmed desorption.
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment

Sentencas: The contribution of interface reaction to the total hydrogen oxidation reaction reaches up to 98%, and the formation of Ni-ceria interface by infiltrating Ni to porous ceria improves the electrochemical activity by 72% at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Hydrogen Oxidation Pathway Over Ni-Ceria Electrode: Combined Study of DFT and Experiment
